评论概述: Classy, Comfortable, and Perfect for 1940s event
评论详情: This dress is an absolute gem! The fit is flattering, and the design is so elegant—it’s perfect for any special event. The fabric feels comfortable and lightweight, and the flowy skirt adds a fun, vintage vibe. I especially love the unique accents, like the collar and sleeve details, which make it stand out from other dresses. It stretches and arrived with no wrinkles but I still steamed over it. I am wearing a size Large.  I paired it with tights, a belt, and a few accessories, and it all came together beautifully. I received so many compliments! The quality of the dress is fantastic for the price, and it held up perfectly throughout the evening. Highly recommend this dress for anyone looking to feel confident and stylish.

This dress was perfect for a Fallout themed event I attended! I added my vault number on the back and a Vault-tec patch to the sleeve! The dress came wrinkled, but was easily ironed and was great quality! Loved it!!!

Cute in photos not in person. Tight in the arms

I thought this was cute and well-made.  Good for a vintage costume.  Looks like an outfit for a waitress in a 50's diner.

Fits perfect, the fabric feels decent, and there wasnt a single loose thread. Would highly recommend a petticoat to go along with it.
Fit well and was perfect for a 50's themed party!

评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: The fabric is cheap and has a plastic feel to it. With all the positive reviews I was expecting better quality. This dress has a 2 out of 5 star 50’s diner feel to it in a bad way. If you’re bigger chested the seam runs across your nipples in a way that not even a better quality belt can fix. Don’t waste your money unless you want a cheap Halloween costume
Did not fit. Not true to size. Was not comfortable

If you are looking for something that is a costume for a 50's event, then this could work for you.  If you are looking for an actual dress, something authentically retro to actually wear as a very nice dress, this is not it.  The skirt part is satiny and ok I suppose, but the shirt part just seems cheap.  Material is like a very thin swimsuit or something.  I will be returning this.
Small in chest. Can not button. :-/

ordered a size up because i have a big chest and broad shoulders, but i think my regular size would have been fine. the waist was a little big so i used some ribbon to cinch it, but otherwise its exactly what i needed.
Cute but tooo small

Ordered a small, fit like a glove! I love the colors so much. Extremely flattering. Great, thick material. Buttons were poorly seen on, but a very easy fix. I recommend going through and making sure they're all secure.

After receiving this item, I wanted to return it because I wanted the money more than the dress. The return policy is quite frustrating. This item isn't a scan and drop at your local Kohls, UPS, etc. You must wait one-three weeks for the vender to send a return label. This return label does NOT include postage. In order to return a $30 dress, you would have to pay over $100 in postage. When I contacted Amazon customer support I was informed that the the refund had already been issued (even though it wasn't in my account) and if I didn't return the dress, I would be charged again for the dress (EVEN THOUGH I NEVER RECEIVED A REFUND). The dress itself is decent quality, runs small, and the zipper is generally useless as it is UNDER the collar. Pretty dress, just impossible to return/refund IF it ends up not fitting.
Poor quality. Color isn't as vibrant as picture. Mainly, the material is see through pillow like...which isn't made for dresses.

The look and style of this dress is ok. It's neither bad nor good. I didn't love it or hate it. It's style and fit didn't make me feel confident. The color wasn't as appealing in person. However, if you are a very particular shape you might be able to wear it better. I don't believe that will be the case for most people who buy this. Also, the chest area wasn't flattering. I felt invisible wearing this dress. On another note, this dress color might be better for lighter tones. I have olive skin and it didn't do much for me.

评论概述: Cute design, good fit, flimsy belt, cheap fabric
评论详情: I loved this dress, I love the fit, design and it's very comfortable because of it's stretchy material. The belt is flimsy, one of the metal loops fell off right after taking the dress out the bag. I'm 5'2 and the length of the dress is mid knee length. The fabric is cheap but I don't really care; it looks like it's made for cosplay or Halloween. I like feeling like I'm a girl scouts lady and that's enough for me 🥰.

I would like to start this review with the dress is really cute in person. However there are flaws no belt loops to hold the belt. Another flaw for me personally was the arms are super tight. If I wasn’t on a time crunch I wouldn’t have made alterations to it I would have returned it. Cute for the price but sizing up in my case didn’t work in my favor.
I like the style and the material however there are NO BELT LOOPS to keep the belt from moving or a way to hold the remaining belt length but to pin it.
This dress was the base for my costume in the SpongeBob musical and it was so cute and comfortable
It would have been better if the material had a little stretch. Love the design but nothing else
I was looking for a house dress (not a night gown) and found this.  I lost a button on the first wash but overall was good quality and was easy to sew the button back on.
This is an attractive vintage dress. I wear a size 12-14, and I bought it in an XL, it is still a bit tight in the chest. I'm very glad I sized up as some other reviewers suggested.

This dress is so cute.  Matches what is pictured.  Pay attention to sizing chart.  There is no stretch to fabric.Mailed from Amazon, arrived quickly.  One criticism is the waist is too high.  Mid-rib versus actual waist.  But still really cute when on.
Dress was so cute. Got a lot of compliments

I absolutely love this dress. I LOVED it, rather. It fit everywhere else…except my chest. Otherwise, it was perfect. It came with the belt, was packaged well, and didn’t have any weird smells or anything. I ordered a XXL which is normally just fine (my body isn’t proportionate—I’m busty with a small ribcage, big stomach, and ZERO hips and butt), so the only problem was the chest area. Like I said…I love this dress. I just can’t wear it.

Beautiful dress and fit! Material is nice and stretchy. I’m usually a Medium but ordered Large according to the chart and it fits amazingly. I’m giving it 4 stars because the eyelets of the belt fell with only just one use.

评论详情: I bought this for a costume, but as a teacher, I think I could get away with wearing it as a regular dress. The quality is not amazing, but the price was worth it, and it fit me true to size, it looked good on, and it was comfortable to wear all day. I bought a small and I'm a 31" bust, 29" waist, 39" hip. To me it needs a belt, so I wore one with it and it was super cute! Also, it felt like a perfect tea-length on me at my height, which I rarely find.
